question:
A movie theater charges $6 per ticket, and pays $1,750 of expenses each time a movie is shown. How many tickets must be sold each time a movie is shown for the theater to make $1 of profit per ticket?
(A) 300
(B) 325
(C) 350
(D) 375
(E) 400
_________________

answer_choices:
400
